name: Battery Collector (dizmackay)
description:
Battery Collector is a third person 3D platformer based on the C++ 3rd Person Battery Collector Power Up Game | v4.9 | Unreal Engine video tutorial series. The game features all of the functionality from the video tutorials, plus custom launch pads, player double-jump function, HUD with a progress bar representing remaining battery power, main menu, and a pause menu.

In a sense the game is complete in that it features menus, rules, and win/lose conditions, however it only features default UE4 resources such as textures, materials, and player model.

This game was developed as part of assessment for USC course SGD240 Advanced Games Programming.
